author: WIRED Staff
title: The Best Weekend Deals: Headphones, Games, Laptops, and More
description: Still stuck inside? So are we. Here are a few things that might make your self-isolation a little easier to bear.
content: There's nothing quite like being told you can't be outside to make you want to be outside, but that's a bad idea right now. Like many of you, we've been finding new ways to keep ourselves busy indoors, whether that's taking up a new hobby like bread baking or… [+2044 chars]
